lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Hello, welcome! Oh hi hi [[name]]! Is there something you need today?

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Hi again! (Giggles) Seeing you makes me happy! How have you been?

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: You met Frog-gege? Hehe, he's super duper nice right? Bullfrog's my big brother! I love him very much!

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Sorrel used to work on a ship, did you know? He's my other big brother! He likes giving me things, hehe!

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Zane is super duper reliable! He works here too. Look at these eggs! They're huge! I've never seen eggs this big before!

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Have you been to the police station before? Gabe-gege works there! He read Treasure Planet with me once!

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Sina showed me his dress for Silver Night once! It was super duper pretty! He's real talented, I love him lots!

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: I've never made much crafts before, but Sou showed me how to make paper stars once! He's like a little brother to me, hehe

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Maybe next time you come around, you might meet Suyin! She works at the counter usually and has these pretty gold highlights in her hair! Did you know she's from a place called Silverkeep?

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: I don't think you'll see her, but her name's Dove and she works on the farm with me! She's a hard worker and a great extra pair of hands!

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Did you see the little doodles on the wall? Yuliya drew them! She's really friend and super chatty, hehe!

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: I hired someone new recently! His name is Taki! He works on the farm with me too and is really nice! He has really nice long hair too!

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Hmm maybe after this I should go visit Tao...oh, sorry didn't see you there! Tao's my good friend! I kinda think of them as like a little...sister? brother? Little sibling!

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Oh oh one day maybe you can come visit Peanut Home with me! Lots of my friends are there! You can meet Willow; she's super duper nice and she made pie for us once!

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Some of the things don't grow here, so I have to put in an order through the Trading Post! You should go sometime, if you need something!

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: The fire station guys are all super duper dedicated! I cook for them sometimes. Because they deserve it! Oh - come on by if you want food!

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Wander likes to set up in random places! I think he sells maps? Would be useful if you're going up the mountain...Anyway, sometimes it's hard to find him, but I love bringing food to him!

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: I hear Elo-jie and Piper annoucing the weather everyday! Piper is super duper smart and can predict the weather hehe! I'm sure she can do it for you if you visit the um...uh...I...I can't pronounce it...

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: I've been to the town hall once with Frog-gege and Theo! We saw a butter churner in there! ..I think. Hmm I think it's now being used like an official place or something? I know Oleander works there!

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Thank you for your purchase! Enjoy!

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Hehe, I hope you like it! Do come again!

after purchasing a lot of items.key: after purchasing a lot of items

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Oh wow! That's a lot of stuff you bought! Are you sure you can carry all of these?

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Ooooh thank you! I've got plenty of uses for this I'm sure! Thank you for your items!

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Um...t-thanks? Oh! No no it's nothing bad I just--hmm...how do I...how do I use this....

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Oh my stars! Please, come in come in! You'll get wet out there!

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Wow, it's really raining heavily out there! I hope the valley doesn't flood...

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Hi [[name]]! It's such nice weather out, huh? After I close up, I wanna wander around town and enjoy the sun for a bit!

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: It's a little hot today! Reminds me of home sometimes... Oh! Do come in, it's cooler in here! Hmm... Quingees don't sweat do they?

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Hmm the clouds are a bit gray today... Please take care out there!

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: I know it hasn't rained yet, but please don't do anything dangerous in this weather!

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Wahhh why are you out on a day like this? You're so tiny you might fly away! Come in come in, wait it out first!

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: I had to run quickly to take down the laundry before it all gets blown away...! Mmm hope it calms down soon...

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Uuu... I don't like stormy weather... It's cold and noisy... Here, I'll make a cup of warm teh tarik for you okay?

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Last year the Storm came and wrecked through everything... Ah, I'm sorry! I didn't want to get the mood down!

meeting Quingee for the first time.key: meeting Quingee for the first time

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Oh! (Blinks.) I didn't expect a Quingee in my store! Where's your owner? Wait - you're here to buy something?!

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Hehe welcome back! What would you like today?

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: I never thought a Quingee would come so often, but here you are! Hehe, what do you need?

after Quingee makes decent progress up t.key: after Quingee makes decent progress up the mountain

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Wow!! It must be real hard huh, especially with how small you are! Come on in, rest your feet a bit!

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Uwahhh congratulations!! The trek must be super duper tiring right? Here, come in - I'll make something to celebrate!

after receiving a gift you like.key: after receiving a gift you like

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Whooaaa!!! Thank you very much! I'll treasure this!

after receiving a gift you like 2.key: after receiving a gift you like 2

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Really? For me? Thank you so, soooo much!

after receiving a gift you don't like.key: after receiving a gift you don't like

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Uh. Um. Hmm. T-Thanks?

after receiving a gift you don't like re.key: after receiving a gift you don't like repeatedly

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: "....." [her face looks conflicted as if she doesn't know what to do - she doesn't want to say she doesn't like it because that's rude, but she doesn't like the gift! Oh dear!]

after receiving a gift you're neutral ab.key: after receiving a gift you're neutral about

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Oh thank you very much! I'm sure I can do something with this!

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: I... I gotta ask. Can you really swim? Someone told me you're sea chickens and I really wanna know!

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: I've made many friends while I've been here! Like Cam, Mallory, Tomoko, Naci, Apelsin, Ambrose, Legretta, Hiraya, Esther -- Oh! You'll be my friend too, right?

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Can Quingees take spicy? Would it be too hot for you...? Hmm........

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Actually I'm not sure what you do take. I feed my Quingee whatever they want but... Hmm. Do Quingees have preferences?

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Hey [[name]], what do you think of the Storm? Do you think it is punishment by the Gods as they say?

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: I host lots of festivals and stuff! Maybe you can come by and enjoy the food there? I'm sure my friends wanna meet you too!
